summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein, detailing shipping charges and payment information. It includes information about the services provided, discounts applied, and payment due date.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary account holder for the FedEx services detailed in the invoice, with his billing and shipping addresses listed.

persons.name: Eric Gany
persons.context: Eric Gany is mentioned as a recipient associated with the shipping address on the invoice.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is mentioned as the sender of a package that was delivered on June 21, 2001.

persons.name: S. Griffis
persons.context: S. Griffis is noted as the individual who signed for the delivery of the package.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is associated with Eric Gany through the shipping address listed on the invoice.
Ghislaine Maxwell is connected to Jeffrey Epstein as a sender of a package to him.

events.title: Package Pickup
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for delivery to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Package Delivery
events.description: A package sent by Ghislaine Maxwell was delivered to Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6809
keyFacts: The invoice is dated June 25, 2001, and details shipping charges totaling $93.11.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed as both the billing and shipping address.
Eric Gany is mentioned as a recipient associated with the shipping address.
Ghislaine Maxwell is noted as the sender of a package delivered to Epstein.
The invoice indicates a payment due date of July 10, 2001.
